name: Bin Chickens: The Demo!
description:
is a fowl party game where you fight the age-old battle between good and seagull!

In a world where diversity in cuisine is being stomped out by the corporate boot of mega-corporation Bippy McChippies, there stands one final city whose people have come together to integrate and create as diverse and tasty an environment as possible.

This is the seaside city of Takeaway City! - And where comes food, there comes scavengers.

After seagulls Cerys and Lucinda move to Takeaway City to try and score the biggest meal of their lives, they meet a colourful cast of other birds, all vying for the same thing!

Verticle Slice of a full game concept that is currently seeking publisher support. 4 Player local Co-op gameplay! Playing as Seagulls, and humans, fighting amongst themselves for the biggest lunch score! Rapid-fire minigame based gameplay!

Bin Chickens! Originally started through the UKGF's Tranzfuser program, and grew to receive further funding. The build that has been uploaded is a wholly work in progress build that we wanted to upload to drum up enthusiasm for the game alongside our social media. With this in mind, the current build of the game is incomplete, lacking full custom sound,  with some of our currently sculpted playable characters not yet implemented, some minigame AI not functioning, and with a lot of features from the final game missing. However we still hope that this working verticle slice of ''Bin Chickens!'' gives you a good holistic impression of what the game can be!

Clio Young-McGahey

We really hope that you enjoy what we've produced, and we hope to bring some updates to Bin Chickens soon!
